definitions.definition: to make a legal agreement by which money is paid in order to use land, a building, a vehicle, or a piece of equipment for an agreed period of time:
examples: The building's 60 units are currently leased to students of the university.

definitions.definition: a legal agreement in which you pay money in order to use a building, piece of land, vehicle, etc. for a period:
examples: He has the house on a long lease.
